author: Jacob M. Schlesinger
title: ‘Trade Wars Are Good,’ Trump Tweets
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump Friday said that “trade wars are good” in a tweet the morning after he announced the U.S. would impose steep tariffs on steel and aluminum, a move that prompted America’s trading partners around the world to suggest they would retaliate.
